scenario_text.value:
I want my sister...
Wahhh, wahhhhhh...

It’s okay, it’s okay. You’re safe now.
Did you and your sister get separated?

Save her, you say?
Did one of those beasts attack her?

No...no, you’re wrong.
Those guys are like fog!
I fell in a weird place, that’s why, uh...
Just, my sister is in trouble, okay?!

Hey, don’t take it seriously. People see all
kinds of things in moments of desperation.

...Poor thing.
Must’ve been scared to death.
Well at any rate, let’s look for the sister.
